result.execSummary:
The defendant Shawn R Kratz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 4th Degree Sexual Assault, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3m).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: La Crosse County Clerk of Court

miscConds.notes:
Def is not to consume or possess any alcohol or controlled substances without a prescription from licensed physician, with random testing

No Contact with J.K.D.
.

Cooperate with Community Support Team and follow all recommendations laid out

Pay Crime Lab and Drug Assessment fee (see 'other' above for amount)

Pay DOC Supervision fees

If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of resititution victims and/or govermental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt

timeConds.notes:
Balance of sentence to be served on Electronic Monitoring at the Trempeleau Care Facility
.

supervisions.notes:
TIME SERVED

Unpaid Court financial obligations are converted to a Civil Judgment
.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Shawn R Kratz

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: From: Jan E Re: no longer def payee - will be payed by Family & Childrens center

2:28 PM - Def in court w/ Atty Stephanie K. Osborne.  Def in custody.  Susan Bakken-Donskey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
DONSKEY- he has time served. OSBORNE: in agmt w/ that
SENTENCE: def senteced to 140   days CJ w/ credit for 140   days - TIME SERVED
financials are converted to a civil judgment

Def in court, in custody, w/Atty Thomas Yoon Huh.  Emily E. Hynek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Ct. 1 - 4th degree sex assault (w/o repeater - Amended Complaint to be filed) - Guilty
  Plea Quest filed/signed/understands
Understands const rights waived
Understands elements of crime
No promises/threats
No alc/drugs in the last 24 hrs
Plea is F, V & I made. Sufficient factual basis to support the plea and the def is found guilty.
Huh: I have been in contact w/ him and believe his thinking is rational. He doesn't want to enter an NGI plea
Amended Complaint due by the end of the wk
Hynek: asking 90 days CJ w/o release. 
Huh: court is aware of his prior conduct and the reasons why. He got a sanction for this. He's still on probation. 38 days in custody on a hold. He's in Tremp Health Care and will be until stable. 
Crt: no ? that the conduct is severe. In looking at the complaint it's a severe intrusion into her personal security and that's not something she will easily forget. While you have limitations - you are better when you have supervision. If I impose 90 days CJ you get credit for 38 then in over a mo you will be released w/o supervision. 
SENTENCE:  
sentence withheld - 2 yrs prob
Cond: 60 days CJ w/ credit for 38 days - balance to be served on EM at the Tremp Care Facility. Cooperate w/ the community support team; follow all trmt recommendations laid out; no alc or controlled subs w/o valid Rx; random testing; NC w/ J.K.D.. Pay CC & DOC fees.

3:34 PM - No appearance by Def - Atty Thomas Yoon Huh present.  Tim Gruenke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Huh: he's in trmt and this will be a plea w/ recommendation for straight jail
PLEA/SENT: 30 days - Andrea to set

Def in custody w/atty Huh
Pretrial Report filed
  Probable Cause Statement and Judicial Determination filed
$500 sig bond signed w/cond: no alcohol or CS, comply w/JS w/testing, comply w/standards of the CCS program
  Def pleads NG - NG pleas entered
PTCDA: 2/27 @ 1:30
STC: 3/19 @ 10 (SLH)
